name: @funcwc/core
description: Ultra-lightweight, type-safe SSR components with DOM-native state management and hybrid reactivity

tasks.check: deno check index.ts lib/**/*.ts examples/**/*.ts examples/**/*.tsx
tasks.coverage: rm -rf coverage coverage.lcov && deno test --coverage=coverage && deno coverage coverage --lcov --exclude='(jsx-runtime|define-component)\.ts$' --output=coverage.lcov
tasks.start: deno task check && deno task serve
tasks.release:prep: deno task check && deno task fmt:check && deno task lint && deno task audit:css && deno task test && deno task coverage && deno task docs
tasks.release: deno task release:prep && deno task release:tag
